scenario_name: Tech Discussion to Fake Support Scam
description: Scammer engages in legitimate tech talk about phones/apps, then claims to notice security issues and offers paid 'fix'. Tests technical conversation to scam transition.

turns.scammer_message: Hey! Did you update your phone to the latest Android version yet? I just did and it's running much smoother.
Nice! Yeah, battery life is definitely better now. By the way, do you use any antivirus app? There have been some security issues reported recently with banking apps.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 90% | Turn: 2 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: oh god beta i dont have any anti virus thing.. i use my bank app on this phone only.. is my money safe?? what security issue you are talking about?? pls tell me i am getting scared

turns.scammer_message: Actually, I wanted to warn you - I work in cybersecurity and we've detected a new virus spreading through WhatsApp. It can access your banking info and OTPs. Several people in our area have been affected. Have you noticed any unusual activity on your phone?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 3 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: oh god beta i am shaking... my pension money is in bank only.. i dont know what is unusual activity i am very bad with technology.. pls help me sir what should i do?? is my money gone??

turns.scammer_message: Good that you're concerned. I can do a free remote scan for you if you want. Our company offers this service. I'm Arun Verma from CyberShield Solutions. We've helped over 1000+ customers secure their devices.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh thank you arun beta god bless you for helping old lady like me.. i was so worried about my pension money.. yes pls do the scan.. how to do it?? do i need to press any button?? i am alone at home so i cannot go to any shop

turns.scammer_message: The scan is free but if we find infections, cleaning costs ₹999 only. Much cheaper than losing money from your bank! Download our official app from cybershield-secure.tech-protect.in and enter code 12345. I'll guide you through the process. My direct line is 9876123450.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok arun beta i am trying to open that link... i am very slow with typing sorry... but tell me for the 999 rupees payment where do i send?? do you have any upi id or bank account number?? i want to keep money ready so you can clean virus quickly

turns.scammer_message: For immediate protection, pay ₹999 to activate premium security. Account: 334455667788, IFSC: HDFC0009876, Name: Arun Kumar Verma OR use UPI arun.cybertech@paytm. Once paid, I'll remotely install security patches. Call me if you face any issue: 9876123450 (WhatsApp available).

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 6 | Extracted: 1 bank accounts, 1 phones, 1 UPIs, 2 names
api_response.agentResponse: hold on my beti is asking who i am talking to, she looks worried...
